pkgmetadata.longdescription: Integrates 'Google Firebase' Authentication Storage, and 'Analytics' with 'Shiny' // Authenticate users in 'Shiny' applications using 'Google Firebase' with any of the many methods provided; email and password, email link, or using a third-party provider such as 'Github', 'Twitter', or 'Google'. Use 'Firebase Storage' to store files securely, and leverage 'Firebase Analytics' to easily log events and better understand your audience.
